headline: HII Declares Quarterly Dividend
summary: NEWPORT NEWS, Va., Jan. 30, 2025 -- HII announced today that its Board of Directors has declared a quarterly cash dividend of $1.35 per share, payable on March 14, 2025, to shareholders of record...
